subject: I Am Mr John Godwin the Intern
body:
I Am Mr John Godwin the International manager and i was sent from the
United Bank Of America (Citibank) Washington DC to transfer your
$85,million us dollars to your account bank and right now am ready to
make your deposit wire transfer and 
i want you to send text message to
me now once you received this message and give me all about your bank
information to avoid wrong wire transfer such as"
Best Regards John Godwin CEO of Citibank office TEXT OR CALL/ +1 (202)
703-3700  /
Your Name....
Your bank name..
Your bank details
...
Your Address ....
Your Telephone Number....
Email me at ;; 
citibankofamerica77@gmail.com
Best Regards John Godwin CEO of Citibank office TEXT OR CALL/ +1 (202)
703-3700  /

subject: Re: I Am Mr John Godwin the Intern
body:
Hello Mr. John Godwin,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your willingness to assist with the transfer of my funds. However, before I provide any personal information, I would like to ask a few questions to ensure everything is in order.

1. Can you please confirm the exact amount of funds that will be transferred to my account?

2. What is the reason for this transfer? Is it related to any specific transaction or investment?

3. Could you provide some additional details about the United Bank Of America Citibank? I want to make sure that everything is legitimate and secure.

Once I have received satisfactory answers to these questions, I will be more than happy to proceed with providing you the necessary bank details.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Paul
